name: Journey to the Space
description:
Singleplayer 3D educational game where you have to make everybody happy, and everybody includes you!!

Controls:

> W, S to MOVE

> Mouse to ROTATE

> Spacebar to INTERACT

Credits

> Everybody as a happy family - Game Designers

> Haru - 2D Artist

> David, Roblin - 3D Artists

> Rafael, Santiago - Programmers

> Space Harpe - Audio

> Rafael - Writer
